_88MetaType.description: CMR level metadata about the item found. This represents data not found in the actual metadata.

___native-id.description: The id used by the provider to identify this item during ingest.

___provider-id.description: The identity of the provider in the CMR

___format.description: The mime type of the original metadata

___revision-id.description: A number >= 1 that indicates which revision of the item.

___deleted.description: Indicates if the item represents a tombstone

___user-id.description: The id of the user who created this item revision.

___revision-date.description: The date this revision was created. This would be the creation or update date of the item in the CMR.

___concept-id.description: The concept id of the item found.

___revision-id.description: A number >= 1 that indicates which revision of the item.

___concept-id.description: The concept id of the item found.

_88ItemType.description: Represents a single item found in search results. It contains some metadata about the item found along with the UMM representing the item. umm won't be present if the item represents a tombstone.

___TimeValue.description: Time value of the time point of temporal extent.

___Description.description: Description of the time value of the temporal extent.

___TimeFormat.description: Time format representing time point of the temporal extent.

_88VariableAggregationTypeEnum.description: This element is used to identify the list of supported methods of variable aggregation.

_88ParameterType.description: This element contains important information about the parameter associated with the resource(s) coupled to this service.

___ParameterRepeatability.description: This element contains the repeatability of the parameter associated with the resource(s) coupled to this service.

___ParameterOptionality.description: This element contains the optionality of the parameter associated with the resource(s) coupled to this service

___ParameterDescription.description: This element contains the description of the parameter associated with the resource(s) coupled to this service.

___ParameterDirection.description: This element contains the direction of the parameter associated with the resource(s) coupled to this service.

___ParameterName.description: This element contains the name of the parameter associated with the resource(s) coupled to this service.

_88ServiceContactRoleEnum.description: Defines the possible values of a service provider role.

_88DataResourceType.description: The DataResource class describes the layers, feature types or coverages available from the service.

___DataResourceTemporalType.description: The temporal extent of the layer, feature type or coverage available from the service.

___TemporalResolution.description: TThe temporal resolution of the layer, feature type or coverage available from the service.

___DataResourceSourceType.description: The resource type of the layer, feature type or coverage available from the service.

___SpatialResolutionUnit.description: The unit of the spatial resolution of the layer, feature type or coverage available from the service.

___TemporalResolutionUnit.description: The unit of the temporal resolution of the layer, feature type or coverage available from the service.

___RelativePath.description: Path relative to the root URL for the layer, feature type or coverage service.

___DataResourceTemporalExtent.description: The temporal extent of the layer, feature type or coverage available from the service.

___DataResourceSpatialExtent.description: The spatial extent of the coverage available from the service. These are coordinate pairs which describe either the point, line string, or polygon representing the spatial extent. The bounding box is described by the west, south, east and north ordinates

___DataResourceSpatialType.description: The spatial extent of the layer, feature type or coverage available from the service.

___DataResourceIdentifier.description: The identifier of the layer, feature type or coverage available from the service.

___SpatialResolution.description: The spatial resolution of the layer, feature type or coverage available from the service.

_88GeneralGridType.description: The general grid consists of a CRS Identifier and an Axis.

___CRSIdentifier.description: The CRS identifier (srsName) of the general grid.

___Axis.description: The grid axis identifiers, all distinct within a grid.

___ContactInformation.description: This is the contact information of the service contact.

___Roles.description: This is the roles of the service contact.

___GroupName.description: This is the contact group name.

_88OperationChainedMetadataType.description: This element contains the name of the chained operation(s) made possible via this service.

___OperationChainName.description: TThis element contains the name of the operation chain made possible via this service.

___OperationChainDescription.description: This element contains the description of the operation chain made possible via this service.

_88AddressType.description: This entity contains the physical address details for the contact.

___StateProvince.description: The state or province portion of the physical address.

___Country.description: The country of the physical address.

___StreetAddresses.description: An address line for the street address, used for mailing or physical addresses of organizations or individuals who serve as contacts for the service.

___PostalCode.description: The zip or other postal code portion of the physical address.

___City.description: The city portion of the physical address.

_88CouplingTypeEnum.description: This element contains the coupling type for the resource(s) coupled to this service. Examples are: 'LOOSE' - this is where a variety of data sources (which are not specified precisely) are used to generate the resource, 'MIXED' - this is where a combination of well-cited data sources are used to generate the resource, 'TIGHT - this is where a single well-cited data source is used to generate the resource.

_88AxisType.description: The axis consisists of an extent and grid information.

___AxisLabel.description: The axis label of the general grid.

___GridResolution.description: The resolution of the general grid.

___Extent.description: The extent of the general grid.

_88CRSIdentifierTypeEnum.description: The CRS Identifier of the spatial extent, expressed as the EPSG code.

_88ServiceKeywordType.description: Enables specification of Earth science service keywords related to the service.  The Earth Science Service keywords are chosen from a controlled keyword hierarchy maintained in the Keyword Management System (KMS).

_88LineStringType.description: The line string consists of two points: a start point and an end ppint.

___EndPoint.description: The end point of the line string.

___StartPoint.description: The start point of the line string.

_88ServiceTypeEnum.description: This element is used to identify the type of the service.

___LongName.description: The long name of the instrument associated with the service.

___ShortName.description: The short name of the instrument associated with the service.

_88ContactMechanismType.description: Method for contacting the service contact. A contact can be available via phone, email, Facebook, or Twitter.

___Type.description: This is the method type for contacting the responsible party - phone, email, Facebook, or Twitter.

___Value.description: This is the contact phone number, email address, Facebook address, or Twitter handle associated with the contact method.

_88AncillaryKeywordsType.description: Words or phrases to further describe the service, software, or tool.

_88ServiceOrganizationShortNameType.description: The unique name of the service organization.

_88AccessConstraintsType.description: Information about any constraints for accessing the service, software, or tool.

_88SubsetTypeEnum.description: This element is used to identify the subset type of the variable.

_88DistributedComputingPlatformTypeEnum.description: This element contains the distributed computing platform (protocol) for the operation(s) made possible via this service.

_88SpatialBoundingBoxType.description: The bounding box consists of west bounding, south bounding, east bounding and north bounding cordinates amd the CRS identifier.

___SouthBoundingCoordinate.description: The south bounding coordinate of the bounding box.

___CRSIdentifier.description: The CRS identifier of the bounding box.

___EastBoundingCoordinate.description: The east bounding coordinate of the bounding box.

___NorthBoundingCoordinate.description: The north bounding coordinate of the bounding box.

___WestBoundingCoordinate.description: The west bounding coordinate of the bounding box.

_88CoupledResourceType.description: This element contains the name of the chained operation(s) made possible via this service.

___ScopedName.description: This element contains the name of the resource(s) coupled to this service.

___DataResourceDOI.description: This element contains the DOI for the resource(s) coupled to this service.

___DataResource.description: This element contains the data identification and scope for the resource(s) coupled to this service.

___CouplingType.description: This element contains the coupling type for the resource(s) coupled to this service.

_88ContactMechanismTypeEnum.description: Defines the possible contact mechanism types.

_88PlatformType.description: This element describes the platform information.

___LongName.description: The long name of the platform associated with the service.

___ShortName.description: The short name of the platform associated with the service.

___Instruments.description: Associates the instrument/sensor that is supported by the service, software, or tool.

_88LongNameType.description: The expanded or long name related to the short name.

___ContactInformation.description: This is the contact information of the service contact.

___Roles.description: This is the roles of the service contact.

_88ConnectPointType.description: This element contains the URL of the invocation of the operation(s) made possible via this service.

___ResourceName.description: This element contains the name of the resource(s) coupled to this service.

___ResourceDescription.description: This element contains the description of the resource(s) coupled to this service.

___ResourceLinkage.description: This element contains the URL of the resource(s) coupled to this service.

_88ServiceOptionsType.description: This object describes service options, data transformations and output formats.

___SupportedInputProjections.description: This element is used to identify the list of supported input projections types.

___SupportedOutputProjections.description: This element is used to identify the list of supported output projections types.

___SubsetTypes.description: This element is used to identify the list of supported subsetting requests.

___VariableAggregationSupportedMethods.description: This element is used to identify the list of supported methods of variable aggregation.

___MaxGranules.description: This field indicates the maximum number of granules which this service can download with one request.

___SupportedOutputFormats.description: The project element describes the list of output format names supported by the service.

___InterpolationTypes.description: This element is used to identify the list of supported interpolation types.

___SupportedInputFormats.description: The project element describes the list of input format names supported by the service.

_88SupportedProjectionType.description: This element is used to identify the input projection type of the variable.

___ProjectionFalseEasting.description: This element is used to identify the linear value applied to the origin of the y-coordinates. False easting and northing values are usually applied to ensure that all the x and y values are positive.

___ProjectionDatumName.description: This element is used to identify the projection datum name.

___ProjectionAuthority.description: This element is used to identify the authority, expressed as the EPSG code, for the list of supported input projection types

___ProjectionName.description: This element is used to identify the list of supported projection types.
enum: NSIDC Sea Ice Polar Stereographic North
WGS 84 / NSIDC Sea Ice Polar Stereographic North
NSIDC EASE Grid North and South (Lambert EA)
WGS 84 / North Pole LAEA Bering Sea
WGS 84 / Pseudo-Mercator -- Spherical Mercator, Google Maps, OpenStreetMap, Bing, ArcGIS, ESRI
Google Maps Global Mercator -- Spherical Mercator
NSIDC Sea Ice Polar Stereographic South
WGS 84 / NSIDC Sea Ice Polar Stereographic South

___ProjectionLongitudeOfCenter.description: This element is used to identify the origin of the y-coordinates at the center of the projection.

___ProjectionLatitudeOfCenter.description: This element is used to identify the origin of the x-coordinates at the center of the projection.

___ProjectionFalseNorthing.description: This element is used to identify the linear value applied to the origin of the x-coordinates. False easting and northing values are usually applied to ensure that all the x and y values are positive.

___ProjectionUnit.description: This element is used to identify the projection unit of measurement.

_88ServiceOrganizationRoleEnum.description: Defines the possible values of a service provider role.

_88ServiceOrganizationType.description: Defines a service organization which is either an organization or institution responsible for distributing, archiving, or processing the data via a service, etc.

___LongName.description: This is the long name of the service organization.

___ShortName.description: This is the short name of the service organization.

___ContactGroups.description: This is the contact groups of the service organization.

___ContactInformation.description: This is the contact information of the service organization.

___ContactPersons.description: This is the contact persons of the service organization.

___Roles.description: This is the roles of the service organization.

_88UseConstraintsType.description: Information on how the item (service, software, or tool) may or may not be used after access is granted. This includes any special restrictions, legal prerequisites, terms and conditions, and/or limitations on using the item. Providers may request acknowledgement of the item from users and claim no responsibility for quality and completeness.

___DataResourceTimePoints.description: Points in time representing the temporal extent of the layer or coverage.

_88DataResourceTemporalTypeEnum.description: The temporal extent of the layer, feature type or coverage available from the service.

_88SupportedFormatTypeEnum.description: This element contains a list of file formats supported by the service.

_88DataResourceSpatialTypeEnum.description: The spatial extent of the layer, feature type or coverage available from the service. These are coordinate pairs which describe either the point, line string, boundingbox, general grid, or polygon representing the spatial extent.

_88CoordinatesType.description: The coordinates consist of a latitude and longitude.

_88InterpolationTypeEnum.description: This element is used to identify the interpolation type of the variable.

___GeneralGrid.description: The spatial extent of the layer, feature type or coverage described by a general grid.

___SpatialLineStrings.description: The spatial extent of the layer, feature type or coverage described by a line string.

___SpatialPolygons.description: The spatial extent of the layer, feature type or coverage described by a polygon.

___SpatialBoundingBox.description: The spatial extent of the layer, feature type or coverage described by a bounding box.

___SpatialPoints.description: The spatial extent of the layer, feature type or coverage described by a point.

___UOMLabel.description: The unit of measure in which values along this axis are expressed.

___LowerBound.description: The lowest value along this grid axis.

___UpperBound.description: The highest value along this grid axis.

_88OperationMetadataType.description: This class describes the signature of the operational metadata provided by the service.

___OperationName.description: This element contains the name of the operation(s) made possible via this service.

___ConnectPoint.description: This element contains the URL of the invocation of the operation(s) made possible via this service.

___OperationDescription.description: This element contains the description of the operation(s) made possible via this service.

___CoupledResource.description: This element contains important information about the resource(s) coupled to this service.

___OperationChainedMetadata.description: This element contains the name of the chained operation(s) made possible via this service.

___Parameters.description: This element contains important information about the parameter associated with the resource(s) coupled to this service.

___DistributedComputingPlatform.description: This element contains the distributed computing platform (protocol) for the operation(s) made possible via this service.

___InvocationName.description: This element contains the name of the invocation of the operation(s) made possible via this service.

_88ContactInformationType.description: Defines the contact information of a service organization or service contact.

___RelatedUrls.description: A URL associated with the contact, e.g., the home page for the service provider which is responsible for the service.

___ContactInstruction.description: Supplemental instructions on how or when to contact the responsible party.

___ServiceHours.description: Time period when the contact answers questions or provides services.

_88ServiceQualityType.description: This object describes service quality, composed of the quality flag, the quality flagging system, traceability and lineage.

___QualityFlag.description: The quality flag for the service.

___Lineage.description: The quality lineage of the service.

___Traceability.description: The quality traceability of the service.

___OperationMetadata.description: This class describes the signature of the operational metadata provided by the service.

___AncillaryKeywords.description: Words or phrases to further describe the service, software, or tool.

___ContactGroups.description: This is the contact groups of the service.

___ServiceQuality.description: Information about the quality of the service, software, or tool, or any quality assurance procedures followed in development.

___Description.description: A brief description of the service.

___Name.description: The name of the service, software, or tool.

___ServiceKeywords.description: Allows for the specification of Earth Science Service keywords that are representative of the service, software, or tool being described. The controlled vocabulary for Service Keywords is maintained in the Keyword Management System (KMS).

___RelatedURLs.description: This element contains important information about the universal resource locator (URL) for the service.

___ServiceOptions.description: This element contains important information about the Unique Resource Locator for the service.

___AccessConstraints.description: Information about any constraints for accessing the service, software, or tool.

___Platforms.description: Associates the satellite/platform that is supported by the service, software, or tool.

___ServiceOrganizations.description: The service provider, or organization, or institution responsible for developing, archiving, and/or distributing the service, software, or tool.

___LongName.description: The long name of the service, software, or tool.

___ScienceKeywords.description: Allows for the specification of Earth Science keywords that are representative of the service, software, or tool being described. The controlled vocabulary for Science Keywords is maintained in the Keyword Management System (KMS).

___Type.description: The type of the service, software, or tool.

___ContactPersons.description: This is the contact persons of the service.

___Version.description: The edition or version of the service, software, or tool.

___UseConstraints.description: Information on how the item (service, software, or tool) may or may not be used after access is granted. This includes any special restrictions, legal prerequisites, terms and conditions, and/or limitations on using the item. Providers may request acknowledgement of the item from users and claim no responsibility for quality and completeness.

$eref.description: CMR level metadata about the item found. This represents data not found in the actual metadata.

___native-id.description: The id used by the provider to identify this item during ingest.

___provider-id.description: The identity of the provider in the CMR

___format.description: The mime type of the original metadata

___revision-id.description: A number >= 1 that indicates which revision of the item.

___deleted.description: Indicates if the item represents a tombstone

___user-id.description: The id of the user who created this item revision.

___revision-date.description: The date this revision was created. This would be the creation or update date of the item in the CMR.

___concept-id.description: The concept id of the item found.

___hits.description: The total number of items that matched the search.

___items.description: The list of items matching the result in this page.

$eref.description: Represents a single item found in search results. It contains some metadata about the item found along with the UMM representing the item. umm won't be present if the item represents a tombstone.

___took.description: How long the search took in milliseconds from the time the CMR received the request until it had generated the response. This does not include network traffic time to send the request or return the response.
